means: 救世主的，以救世主自居的，救星似的

sentence.Network_en: The cult leader saw himself as a Messianic figure.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个异教团体的领袖把自己看作救世主一般的人物。

sentence.Network_en: The reforms were carried out with an almost messianic zeal.
sentence.Network_cn: 改革是以极大的热情进行的。

sentence.Network_en: The book proved such a success that the authors followed it up with "The Messianic Legacy".
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书取得了巨大的成功，作者于是又推出一部《弥赛亚的遗产》。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 米兰妮指出凯龙星和木星有相位的人，通常会有当弥赛亚（messianic）救世主的倾向，会不断寻求终极的真理、万能的解药和圆满的 …
在这本书中，救世主（Messianic）血统的渔夫国王被称为Messios.这是一本专门论述圣杯血统利安在作品中引用了沃尔伦的论述。
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 - 外国语 -... ... Messiah 弥赛亚 Messianic 弥赛亚的 messieurs 诸君.

list.abs: ...国的学者，认为福音书的信息比较注重这一点。威里特(W. Wrede)在1901年按编修批判学发表其《秘密的弥赛亚》(messianic secret)，说耶稣不想在生前公开其身份并不是耶稣本身的意思，而是马可及其他福音书作者的编修手法导致这样。福音书.
That message , often delivered in sententious , near messianic tones , had little appeal., 这些信息通常以警世名言 , 接近救世主的语气发出 , 却鲜有吸引力.
the messianic destiny of all humanity ., 救世主的命运 , 全人类的.
Babism originated as a messianic movement in Shiite Islam .巴布教原本是伊斯兰教什叶派里的一种救世主运动。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from French messianique, from Messie (see messiah), on the pattern of rabbinique 'rabbinical'

entry.def: Messianic means relating to the belief that a divine being has been born, or will be born, who will change the world.

example.ex: The cult leader saw himself as a Messianic figure.
example.tran: 这个异教团体的领袖把自己看作救世主一般的人物。

entry.def: Messianic means relating to the belief that there will be a complete change in the social order in a country or in the world.

example.ex: The defeated radicals of the French Revolution were the first to have this messianic vision in 1794.
example.tran: 1794年法国大革命中失败的激进分子最先预见到了社会会发生根本改变。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to a messiah promising deliverance;

auth_sentence.content: He is gently messianic in his anachronistic habits.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He is gently messianic in his anachronistic habits.

auth_sentence.content: They are no longer about messianic fantasy.
